name: Highway Blossoms
description: Install the GOG version of Highway Blossoms

execute.description: Installing game, it may take a while...

files.installer: N/A: Select the game's setup file

content:
files:
- installer: 'N/A: Select the game''s setup file'
game:
  appid: 451760
  args: '""'
  exe: start.sh
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- chmodx: installer
- execute:
    args: -- --i-agree-to-all-licenses --noreadme --nooptions --noprompt --destination=$GAMEDIR
    description: Installing game, it may take a while...
    file: installer
